sentences.sContent: The leaves change colour, then shrivel.
sentences.sCn: 树叶变了颜色，然后干枯了。

synos.tran: 使枯萎；使皱缩；使束手无策

remMethod.val: sh(音似： 使) + rivel(看做river， 河流) → 天气干旱使河流无水， 树木枯萎 → (使)枯萎

trans.tranOther: if something shrivels, or if it is shrivelled, it becomes smaller and its surface becomes covered in lines because it is very dry or old
